channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15173] Execute mergeRegions RPC call as the request user
item.description:
This is follow up to HBASE-15132

Master currently sends mergeRegions RPC to region server under user 'hbase'.
This issue is to execute mergeRegions RPC call as the request user

See tail of HBASE-15132 for related discussion.
item.summary: Execute mergeRegions RPC call as the request user

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
